Welcome, what can I get for you?: I would like one cheeseburger meal.
Would you like that with large fries?
A medium soft drink, please.
What drink with the meal?
I'll have a Coca-Cola.
Will there be anything else?
No thank you, that's all.

Tervetuloa, mitä saisi olla?: Tilauksenne yhteensä on kaksitoista euroa ja viisikymmentä senttiä.
Welcome, what can I get for you?: Your total is twelve euros and fifty cents.
Please drive to the next window.
Can I pay by card?
Yes, contactless payment is fine.
Here is your order, you're welcome.
Thanks a lot, have a good day!
I'd like two chicken burgers without mayonnaise.
Do you have vegetarian options?
One veggie burger, please.
Could I get a milkshake in strawberry flavor?
Could you include ketchup and mustard?
Six chicken nuggets and a dip, please.
What kind of dip do you have?
Garlic mayonnaise, please.
Sorry, could you repeat the last item?
Did I already say the drink?
No, what would you like to drink?
I'll take a Fanta.
Do you have a kids' meal?
Yes, with or without a toy?
With the toy, please.
That will be twenty euros total.
Please drive to the payment window.
Here you go.
Thank you and goodbye.
Hi, I'd like to order food to go.
All our meals are for takeaway.
Could I get one large milkshake?
Chocolate or vanilla?
Chocolate, please.
I'll also have one double cheeseburger.
Okay, one double cheese. Anything else?
Fries on the side, please.
Large or regular?
Regular size is fine.
Your order is ready for payment.

Tervetuloa, mitä saisi olla?: Hetkinen, haluaisin lisätä vielä yhden asian.
Welcome, what can I get for you?: Just a moment, I'd like to add one more thing.
Of course, what would you like?
One apple pie, please.
Alright, it's been added.
That's twenty-four euros even.
Please drive ahead to the pick-up window.

Tervetuloa, mitä saisi olla?: Hei, tarkistaisin vain, onko hampurilaisessa suolakurkkua.
Welcome, what can I get for you?: Hi, I just wanted to check if there are pickles in the burger.
Yes, all our cheeseburgers have pickles.
Can I get mine without pickles?
Of course, we'll take them off.
Thanks a lot!
Could you put lots of ice in the drink?
Absolutely.
And could I get a straw?
Straws and napkins are in the bag.
Great, thanks for the help.
Enjoy your meal!
Do you have coffee?
Yes, black or with milk?
Black, please.
One large coffee to go.
Do you have any dessert?
We have ice cream and milkshakes.
I'll have one small soft-serve ice cream.
With or without sauce?
With caramel sauce, please.
Okay, it's coming right up.
Can we get two forks?
Yes, I'll put them in the bag.
Excuse me, but my order is missing the fries.
I'm sorry about that, here they are.
No problem, thank you.
Could I get a cup of water?
Yes, just a moment.
Here is your order and the receipt.
Thanks, I don't need the receipt.
Is your mayonnaise lactose-free?
Yes, all our dips are lactose-free.
Great, I'll take one of those.
Is this the right queue for the drive-thru?
Yes, you are in the correct queue.
How long will the order take to prepare?
About five minutes.
Could I get the meal without onions?
Yes, we'll note that in the order.
Your order is ready for pickup.
Thank you for the fast service.
You're welcome, come again!

Tervetuloa, mitä saisi olla?: Voinko lisätä tilaukseen vielä yhden juoman?
Welcome, what can I get for you?: Can I add one more drink to the order?
Yes, what drink would you like?
A diet coke, please.

Tervetuloa, mitä saisi olla?: Anteeksi, meillä on vain sokeritonta Pepsi Maxia.
Welcome, what can I get for you?: Sorry, we only have sugar-free Pepsi Max.
That works fine.
I forgot to order a dip for the nuggets.
No worries, which dip would you like?
Barbecue dip, please.
Is the hamburger patty fully cooked?
Yes, we cook all patties until they are well-done.
Can the meal be changed to a salad?

Tervetuloa, mitä saisi olla?: Ranskalaisten tilalle voi vaihtaa pienen salaatin.
Welcome, what can I get for you?: The fries can be swapped for a small salad.
Yes, I'll take the salad instead of the fries.
What salad dressing do you have?
We have vinaigrette and a yogurt dressing.
I'll have the vinaigrette.
Could you put some napkins in the bag?
I already put in extra.
This is not my order.

Tervetuloa, mitä saisi olla?: Voi anteeksi, hetkinen niin korjaan asian.
Welcome, what can I get for you?: Oh, I'm sorry, one moment and I'll fix it.
